We have learned the concept of modular programming and learned that functions are used to divide our program into small sub programs performing specific tasks meaning we divide our program into small logical parts all working together.
Below is Treasure hunter game code, divide this project into functions so that we separate it into logical parts (those part which are performing a specific task will be converted into a function).
as we want functions to perform tasks but also reflect back changes into main function.

so they can be accessed by all functions
